attributes.action: Preserve University funding from savage cuts in order to safeguard the valuable work carried out in British institutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The economy benefits from academic work  and most developed countries rightly make such education a priority.
It would be better to raise general taxation levels rather than cut back University funding. The government needs to take a strategic, long term view.
Helen Bantock
